resources.string: Your budget is not zero-based.Please go back and adjust values

string.name: txt_mail_template
string.p:
Thank you for using Dave Ramsey’s Budget Starter. Your budget is ready to download.
If you liked Budget Starter you may also enjoy The Dave Ramsey Show iPhone App. With this app, you can:
- Listen to the show, LIVE
- Access the last 30 days of Dave’s show, commercial-free
- Search and listen to thousands of calls from the show
- Email Dave on-air
- And more…
string.a: Go to the App Store Now.
